name: CAN you stay alive?
description:
CAN you survive the hordes of levitating candy? They are after your precious soda drink! Deploy your toy soldiers and pencil barricades to survive as much as you can!

Made using a fake 3D "Engine" made a looong time ago in GameMaker.

A downlodable, barely playable thing for Windows, made for the Ludum Dare 46: Keep it alive

CONTROLS

Movement - Mouse

Mouse right click - Deploy a pencil barricade

Mouse left click - Deploy a toy soldier

Enter key - Restart game

ESC key - Exit game

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/can-you-stay-alive
